document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomy of the genus Miobdelus Sharp, 1889 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylinini) and five new species from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomy of the genus Miobdelus Sharp, 1889 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylinini) and five new species from China

Smetana, 2001 : 188 (

)
; Smetana, 2004 : 763 (Catalog of Palaearctic Region); Smetana, 2005a : 303 (new records from Sichuan Hongyaxian, near the summit of Wawu-shan); Sch√ºlke & Smetana, 2015 : 1085 (Catalog of Palaearctic Region).

Measurements. Body length: 12.8‚Äì16.9 mm. CL: 0.73; EL: 2.78; ELS: 1.49; EW: 2.79; HL: 2.09; HW: 2.23; PO: 0.90; PL: 2.42; PW: 2.07.

Distribution.
Miobdelus inornatus
is at present known from Sichuan Province in China.
